content: Ask an AI to explain a piece of code in extremely simple language — then rewrite it more clearly.
Generate two different solutions from an AI and compare which one is more maintainable.
Give an AI a vague prompt. See what assumptions it makes. Use that to learn better prompting.
Ask AI to propose 3 refactor ideas for your latest code commit.
Give the AI a buggy snippet. See if you can beat its debugging time.
Ask an AI to rewrite code in a style guide of your choice.
Use AI to generate test cases — then write one manually that it missed.
Generate documentation using AI, then fix inaccuracies it makes.
Use an AI to simplify a deeply nested function. Compare readability.
Ask AI to propose folder structures for your next project — pick your favorite.
